name: DailyBibleVerse
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Want to start your day with a verse from the Word of God? You can now receive a daily Bible verse delivered directly to your Flash Briefing. This skill will give you a verse from the KJV Bible each day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
